column4: greig:  you've got two Linux partitions.  which one is Edgy on?  the first or the second. Do you recall?
hi
I got the supper grub disck
pimpin.  did it work?  tried it out?
oh.  um.  I'd have to look through it myself.  I usually just explore around.  maybe "fix mbr" option.
all i was able to do is get it to boot in to my windows partion
you didn't see "fix MBR" option?
nope
i'll fire it up on my laptop.  just a sec.
it's under the "GNU/Linux (Advanced)" option.
oh k
I will try that thanks
I tryed that and it didn't work
you weren't able to fix your MBR?
oh.  i think that's progress.  pastebin your menu.lst and the output of `fdisk -l` for me.
that is the paste
is my configs wrong
nope getting " error 8: kernel must be loaded before booting...
I crossed my finger and rebooted no luck
same as before?
i think you need to install grub to your primary (first) hard drive.  that may be the issue.
grub is your boot loader.  it needs to be on the first hard drive (yes, hd0) because that's probably what your BIOS is looking at.
